mdxSource.renderedOutput:
Introduction

The Tooltip component is used to describe icon buttons. In some cases tooltips are used to show more content, this should be used cautiously since it is hard to be completely accessible.

Tooltip with IconButton

Each IconButton should always be wrapped in a Tooltip.

Tooltip to show some content

Use with caution, it’s hard to be completely accessible.

Tooltip with card appearance

Use with caution, it’s hard to be completely accessible.

Positioning the Tooltip

The Tooltip can be positioned on the following positions using the position prop:

  • Position.TOP
  • Position.TOP_LEFT
  • Position.TOP_RIGHT
  • Position.BOTTOM
  • Position.BOTTOM_LEFT
  • Position.BOTTOM_RIGHT
  • Position.LEFT
  • Position.RIGHT

For a Tooltip the only really useful sides are TOP, RIGHT, BOTTOM and LEFT as shown below.

Conditionally show Tooltip

In some cases you may want to only show a Tooltip when a certain condition is true. You can accomplish this by manually hiding the Tooltip with the isShown prop when it should never be shown, and leaving the component uncontrolled when you want it to display on hover (standard behavior).

components.name: Alert
components.description: The Alert component is used to show feedback to the user about an action or state.

components.name: Autocomplete
components.description: The Autocomplete component allow user to type and select from a list of options.

components.name: Avatar
components.description: The Avatar component is used to represent users. And should only be used for users.

components.name: Badge & Pill
components.description: The Badge and Pill components are labels with a background color.

components.name: Button
components.description: A Button triggers an action or an event.

components.name: Checkbox
components.description: The Checkbox component allows user to select multiple items from a list.

components.name: Combobox
components.description: The Combobox component is used for selecting an option from a predefined list of options.

components.name: Corner Dialog
components.description: The CornerDialog component is used for announcements such as new features and feedback requests.

components.name: Dialog
components.description: The Dialog component is used to show content on top of an overlay that requires user interaction.

components.name: File Uploader
components.description: The File Uploader component allows users to drag and drop files into a dropzone area (or click to select files from the browser file picker) to upload files.

components.name: Filepicker
components.description: The Filepicker component is used to select one or multiple files from the file system.

components.name: Group
components.description: The Group component identifies a group of inputs/elements and implements the group WAI-ARIA role.

components.name: Menu
components.description: The Menu component shows a list of actions that user can take.

components.name: Pagination
components.description: The Pagination component is used to split up content into several pages and navigate between pages.

components.name: Popover
components.description: The Popover component shows floating content in relation to a target.

components.name: Pulsar
components.description: The Pulsar component is a user education UI used to indicate to a user where they should take a particular action.

components.name: Radio
components.description: The Radio component allows user to select a single item from a list.

components.name: Search Input
components.description: The Search Input component allows user to search via typing in text.

components.name: Select
components.description: The Select component allow user to click and select from a list of options.

components.name: Select Menu
components.description: The Select Menu component allows selection of multiple items from a dropdown list.

components.name: Side Sheet
components.description: The Sidesheet component is used to show more details about an object.

components.name: Spinner
components.description: The Spinner component is used to indicate a loading state.

components.name: Status Indicator
components.description: The Status indicator is used to indicate the status of an item.

components.name: Switch
components.description: The Switch component is used to switch between two options and the result of the change is immediate.

components.name: Tab
components.description: Use Tabs to organize your content in logical groupings.

components.name: Table
components.description: The Table component is used to show all information from a data set.

components.name: Tag Input
components.description: The Tag Input component allow user to type in multiple values as tags.

components.name: Text Input
components.description: The Text Input component allows user to type in text.

components.name: Textarea
components.description: The Text Area component allow user to type in longer content.

components.name: Toaster
components.description: The Toaster component is used to show an ephemeral message as an overlay.

components.name: Tooltip
components.description: The Tooltip component is used to show more content of a target.

component.name: Tooltip
component.description: The Tooltip component is used to show more content of a target.
